page.title: 16Skipping Games
page.content:
These are some skipping games,played by girls at our school:-
Not last night.................. Up and down the ladder.......... Inky,pinky,ponky................ Teddy bear,teddy bear........... Salt,mustard,vinegar,pepper..... There's somebody under the bed.. I like coffee,I like tea........ King kong did a pong............ Bumper car...................... All in together girls........... High,low,medium,slow............ Mother in the kitchen........... Rocker.......................... I am a Girl Guide............... Cowboy Joe from Mexico.......... Pick a Penny up................. These are all played with two people turning the rope and the rest skipping.
